title: 10 Genius Ideas from the Roman Empire That Still Matter Today by Steven Marr
description: The Roman Empire’s brilliance is far from ancient history. The Roman Empire Got It Right by Steven Marr is your passport to the past that built the future—from engineering marvels like aqueducts, concrete, and sewer systems to groundbreaking advances in health care, law, language, and even your favorite guilty pleasures (street food and wine bars […] The post 10 Genius Ideas from the Roman Empire That Still Matter Today by Steven Marr appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Beth Haring
